import React,{useEffect}from'react';import starIcon from'/Users/tahaal/Desktop/personalwebsite/public/star-icon.png';// Replace with the actual path to your star icon
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FallingStars(){useEffect(function(){var numStars=100;for(var i=0;i<numStars;i++){var star=document.createElement('img');star.className='star';star.src=starIcon;var xPos=Math.random()*window.innerWidth;var yPos=Math.random()*window.innerHeight;var duration=Math.random()*3+2+'s';star.style.left=xPos+'px';star.style.top=yPos+'px';star.style.animationDuration=duration;document.querySelector('.star-container').appendChild(star);}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"star-container"});}export default FallingStars;
